Nifty GUI

Moving to git staying with sf.net

14 Jul 2011

Nifty is hosted at https://sourceforge.net/</a> and is</del> was using SVN. We've moved all of the Nifty projects to git. You can browse the projects online here http://nifty-gui.git.sourceforge.net/git/gitweb-index.cgi</a> and there are informations available on how to access the project here</a>.

If you had svn write access you should be able to push to the remote git repository.

We'll keep the SVN repos for bugfixes and an eventually 1.3.x release. Everything else will happen in git :)
